Title: The Voice of the Speakers
Description: Please take word of our victory to Alleria in Dornogal. I'm sure our allies will be pleased to hear what we can provide for the war effort.
RewardText:
What amazing news, $n!

The War Golems awaken, and march against our enemies once again, just like in times past.

Your contribution to the cause of the Machine Speakers, and to all of the Earthen, will not be forgotten.
